This module will help you generate additional sales thanks to your multichannel presence.NB: This module is for traders with a SIRET French business identification number.

module.name: trustedshops
module.description: Este módulo se ofrece por Trusted Shops, que ya está integrado en la versión 1.4 de PrestaShop. Descargar de forma gratuita a la versión 1.3
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Este módulo se ofrece por Trusted Shops, que ya está integrado en la versión 1.4 de PrestaShop. Descargar de forma gratuita a la versión 1.3.
module.additional_description: Trusted Shop es el sello de confianza europeo del comercio en línea, le permite plantificar un ambiente de confianza y de seguridad ideal a los clientes. Con el sistema “evaluación cliente Trusted Shop” los clientes tienen la oportunidad de evaluar las prestaciones de su tienda en línea. Despúes, estas informaciones están compiladas y una nota media está atribuida simbolizada por estrellas directamente fijadas en la página web. Ese módulo refuerza la confianza de sus visitantes con respecto a su página web y le conducirá a encargar más fácilmente, lo que aumentará el índice de transformación de su tienda en línea. Descarga pronto Trusted Shops e aprovecha de condiciones especiales en calidad de usuario PrestaShop!

module.name: mondialrelay
module.categoryName: Punto de entrega y Recogida en tienda
module.description: Este módulo se ofrece por Mondial Relay, que ya está integrado en la versión 1.4 de PrestaShop. Descargar de forma gratuita a la versión 1.3
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Este módulo se ofrece por Mondial Relay, que ya está integrado en la versión 1.4 de PrestaShop. Descargar de forma gratuita a la versión 1.3. Entregando más de 40 millones de paquetes al año, mediante su red de 6.000 puntos de recogida (“Points Relais” en Francia, Bélgica y Luxemburgo, “Punto Pack” en España), o vía entrega a domicilio, Mondial Relay es hoy uno de los más importantes actores del sector de las entregas a particulares. 12 de los 15 más importantes sites E-Commerce franceses han elegido los servicios de Mondial Relay debido a la calidad de su oferta y el control total de los procesos logísticos. Mondial Relay quiere compartir y desarrollar este saber hacer con todos los e-comerciantes, cualquier sea su nivel de actividad, sin imposición de volúmenes mínimos. Ahora esta oferta de servicios está disponible en Prestashop. Con el acceso a las mismas soluciones de entrega en puntos de recogida, hasta la fecha reservadas a nuestras grandes cuentas, sus clientes tendrán a partir de hoy más opciones, y podrán escoger la entrega de sus pedidos en una tienda de conveniencia beneficiándose de la red más amplia a nivel europeo, con el mejor nivel de calidad posible (franjas horarias, ubicaciones).
module.additional_description: Con este módulo, usted tendrá una gama más amplia de métodos de envío, los clientes apreciarán la oportunidad de ser entregados en las tiendas, lo que mejorará su tasa de conversión.

module.name: envoimoinscher
module.displayName: Envíos Boxtal - punto de entrega, a domicilio, express
module.description: Gestiona distintos trasportistas a través de un solo modulo y ahorra hasta un 75% en tus gastos de expedición sin compromiso de volumen ni de contrato
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Gestiona distintos trasportistas a través de un solo modulo y ahorra hasta un 75% en tus gastos de expedición sin compromiso de volumen ni de contrato.
module.additional_description: 1. MEJORA LA TASA DE TRANSFORMACIÓN DE TUS CESTASOfrece la opción a tus clientes de distintos modos de envío a través de nuestra selección de transportistas en punto de entrega, a domicilio o en express. 2. REDUCE TUS GASTOS DE TRANSPORTE Aprovecha nuestras tarifas negociadas con reducciones de hasta un 75% con respecto a los precios públicos con los mejores transportistas del mercado, sin condición de volumen ni de contrato. 3. AHORRA TIEMPO EN LA GESTION DE TUS EXPEDICIONESGenera tus albaranes en 1 solo clic y sigue tus envíos desde nuestro back-office Prestashop. Una sola factura para todos los transportistas. 4. ACELERA EL LANZAMIENTO DE TU SITIO WEBUn solo modulo a instalar para generar todos tus envíos. Boxtal es tu único interlocutor antes, durante y después de la expedición, sean cuales sean los transportistas seleccionados. Ahorra tiempo y concéntrate en lo esencial.

module.name: twenga
module.displayName: Adquisición de tráfico avanzada en la red Twenga
module.description: Integra tu feed de productos en el motor de búsqueda Twenga y en más de 1500 sitios web asociados gracias a Smart LEADS, de Twenga Solutions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integra tu feed de productos en el motor de búsqueda Twenga y en más de 1500 sitios web asociados gracias a Smart LEADS, de Twenga Solutions.
module.additional_description: Smart LEADS es una solución de adquisición de tráfico cualificado totalmente automatizada, que se dirige a las tiendas online de cualquier tamaño. Smart LEADS genera visibilidad y optimiza el rendimiento de las campañas publicitarias en la red Twenga en tiempo real. Esta red incluye los sitios web de búsqueda de shopping Twenga y más de 1500 asociados en todo el mundo entre comparadores de precios, guías de compra y sitios editoriales. Cómo funciona Smart LEADS:Smart LEADS analiza el rendimiento de tus productos en función de varias decenas de indicadores (conversiones, carrito medio, mejores ventas...).Establece el perfil de tus compradores gracias a 40 factores (historial de navegación, tipo de cliente, zona geográfica, hora...).Calcula la afinidad entre tus productos y los compradores.Clasifica los productos en función de criterios de rendimiento y de afinidad, y destaca aquellos que tienen más probabilidad de generar ventas. Esta lógica se aplica, en tiempo real, para cada display de un producto en la red de Twenga. ¡Incrementa tus ventas y mejora tus ingresos con una solución única! 2* CONVERSIONESDirígete a audiencias y a usuarios altamente cualificados3* CLIENTESIncrementa de manera significativa tu base de clientes y tus ventas6* INGRESOSOptimiza de forma precisa tus objetivos en costes de adquisición

module.name: boxdropshipment
module.description: You can now offer fast and safe shipping in a single click thanks to boxdrop ® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: You can now offer fast and safe shipping in a single click thanks to boxdrop ® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office.﻿
module.additional_description: Stop loosing time with the shipment handling in your shop with boxdrop® eLogistics (transport and delivery)﻿.﻿ boxdrop® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office - adds a fully integrated shipment subsystem to your PrestaShop for free. Simply group your goods into parcels and generate shipment documents and a pickup request with a single click. To ensure a safe and fast delivery, all shipments are being handled by DHL, the world leader in logistic. No need for a lengthy sign-up process with sales representatives, simply create a boxdrop account and you are good to go.

module.name: veplatform
module.description: La única solución de marketing automatizado que trata el abandono y los problemas de conversión en tu página web, a lo largo de todo el customer journey
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: La única solución de marketing automatizado que trata el abandono y los problemas de conversión en tu página web, a lo largo de todo el customer journey. Comienza a incrementar tus ventas hoy, con un periodo de prueba gratuito de 30 días.
module.additional_description: El problema: El 98% de los visitantes de tu página web no compran. El abandono del carrito de compra es el principal motivo para que 3 de cada 4 clientes potenciales no estén comprando. ¿Qué hace Ve Interactive para evitarlo?Interactúa con los usuarios que están a punto de abandonar el sitio webRecupera a los clientes perdidos y los lleva de vuelta a la páginaAumenta los ingresos de tu páginaMejora la experiencia de tus clientes dentro de la webBeneficios de trabajar con Ve Interactive:Convierte a los visitantes pasivos en clientes – interactúa con los visitantes durante su visita en la web, y también una vez que han abandonadoFácil de utilizar – instalación y mantenimiento sencillos, con un modelo de precios transparente (pago a performance – sólo pagas cuando los consumidores convierten)Soluciones basadas en datos – nuestro conocimiento sobre el comportamiento del consumidor nos ayuda a mostrar el mensaje adecuado en el momento oportunoGestión de marca centralizada y campañas personalizables – carga tu logo y tu fuente para mantener la coherencia de marca, cambia los textos para personalizar la campañaMejoras continuas – las funcionalidades se actualizan y mejoran de forma gradual al mismo tiempo que tu negocio creceListado de FAQs – ponemos a tu disposición toda nuestra experiencia

module.name: yousticeresolutionsystem
module.description: Youstice is a customer service tool. It helps retailers to process all claims and resolve them quickly and efficiently
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Youstice is a customer service tool. It helps retailers to process all claims and resolve them quickly and efficiently. This module integrates Youstice in your online store, making it easy to use by customers who want to complain about a service or a product.  Youstice plugin is only available for French Merchants
module.additional_description: From November, companies will be able to acquire the new Customer satisfaction management package, which includes the Youstice module, as well as protection against cost of unresolved disputes that customers might escalate to ODR (online dispute resolution) bodies. The package, offered jointly by Youstice in cooperation with AXA Protection Juridique and Prestashop meets the requirements of the  new French law on consumer disputes, while optimizing the budget of your customer service. For more information, check www.youstice.com/fr/lepack The package is only available for French companies.  Advantages: - Youstice`s customer service module plus coverage against legal disputes - Compliant with the new French consumer law - Free Trial-Period (45 days), without risk

PrestaShop and BlueSnap help shoppers make purchases easily and securely with the free BlueSnap module.

Thanks to YOU, they act for the planet and they let it know on Facebook and Twitter. So you get better visibility on the Internet, free of charge ! Feel free to call us at +33 184 780 480 or drop us an email at contact@reforestaction.com

module.additional_description: This payment module allows you to customize your payment page:Your payment page with your colorsOccasionally organize fundraising operations for organizations of your choiceEnable / Disable 3D secure systemSubmit a recurring payment to your customers Our pricing is based on your monthly sales volume : PayGreen is one of the most economical solutions on the market. Our pricing fits your monthly turnover.

module.name: bpostshm
module.description: Three delivery methods in Belgium   With Shipping Manager, you integrate our three delivery methods directly into your online shop, so your customers are able to choose the one they prefer
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Three delivery methods in Belgium   With Shipping Manager, you integrate our three delivery methods directly into your online shop, so your customers are able to choose the one they prefer.To a private address: such as home, office or a family member.To one of our 1250 pick-up points: post offices or post points like supermarkets (Delhaize, Spar), bookshops (Press Shop, Relay), service stations (Total, Q8) and neighbourhood stores.To one of our 150 parcel lockers: ideally situated in high footfall locations, stations and shopping centres. Simplifying your logistics   With the Shipping Manager, your customers select their delivery method when they place their order online. You just need to take care of the practical aspects.Follow-up and preparation of your parcelsCreation of shipping and return labels, both domestic and internationalManagement of parcels shipmentsTracking  of your parcels  This add-on is available for free to all customers who have a signed parcels contract with bpost.
module.additional_description: Shipping Manager is an application that helps you manage your parcel shipments and create your shipping and return labels, both domestic and international. • Easy to integrate, plug and play. • Simple integration in your online shop: during the order process your customers will not even notice they have been transferred to Shipping Manager • Immediate access to the three bpost delivery methods: o Home delivery o Delivery to a pick-up point o Delivery to a parcel locker • Management of your parcel deliveries through the Administration module (label printing, parcel tracking, parcel preparation follow-up). • Thanks to its adaptive design, the graphical user interface automatically changes to suit the customer’s viewing device (smartphone, tablet, PC). • Configuration of prices based on delivery method, immediately visible in the online shop • Access to the most popular options for your shipments (signature, basic insurance, automatic second presentation) • Printing directly from the backend of Prestashop • Track and trace your parcels online from the backend

module.name: dpdfrance
module.description: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders.
module.additional_description: Choose a high-quality service, choose DPD France: deliveries in 24/48 hours, detailed tracking information online, local support and more. Integrate our module in just a few clicks and enjoy several innovative delivery options to satisfy your customers.

module.name: mercadopagobr
module.categoryName: Pago con Tarjeta o Carteras digitales
module.description: Receive payments with a customizable and standard checkout, and bar code payment
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Receive payments with a customizable and standard checkout, and bar code payment. Mercado Pago provide the highest security standard with PCI Level 1 certification and an internal robust fraud analysis.
module.additional_description: Mercado Pago can help Prestashop’s merchants increase their sales with its cutting edge payment technology, providing solutions that fit with the clients’ needs:  - Online and real-time payment processing- High approval rate through an internal robust fraud analyses - High conversion with our customized checkout- Customizable bar code payment - Potential new consumers due to our large user base – 120 million in Latin America- Highest Level 1 PCI certification- Major credit card brands acceptance- Payment in installments- Two-day or fourteen day funding*- Omni-channel payment system for website and mobiles- One-click to pay with MercadoPago’s standard checkout- Sellers protection program*- Easy to install module  * According to MercadoPago’s terms and conditions.

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically. Free 30-day trial! : Immediately after the notification and shop-registration, you will receive your personal unique activation key (pass phrase). With this key you can activate and use the software to it's full extent. No additional or further costs are incurred during the 30 days test period

module.name: becommerce
module.description: The BeCommerce Label is a quality mark for online shopping of products and services in the BeLux
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The BeCommerce Label is a quality mark for online shopping of products and services in the BeLux. The BeCommerce Label demonstrates that your company complies with the BeCommerce Label Code and that your e-commerce site was certified by an independent organisation i.e. Bureau Veritas. With the BeCommerce Label members inform the consumer that they provide a reliable and secure way of online shopping.
module.additional_description: ​Advantages •        As a member you are allowed to display the BeCommerce Quality label. Research has demonstrated that the BeCommerce Quality label stands for reliability and safety. 83% of the consumers know/recognise the BeCommerce Quality label and 72% take the BeCommerce Quality label into account for online purchases. The BeCommerce Quality label provides consumers’ trust and contributes to higher conversion, therefore more turnover. •        BeCommerce manages the interests of the members by – among others – influencing the (new) law and regulations. It also regularly takes part in conversations with the various parties around the e-commerce market. •        With the membership and the BeCommerce Quality label, you show you comply with the law and regulations. You can apply the Terms & Conditions of BeCommerce. BeCommerce has the compliance of laws and regulations as single quality mark independently checked through the certification carried out by Bureau Veritas. This too increases the consumers’ trust in your online shop. •        You entitle the consumer to independent mediation, if you and the consumer have a dispute about the purchase. BeCommerce mediates with experienced solicitors and employees. This ensures very few complaints end up in a legal dispute. Should it go that far, BeCommerce is the only quality mark to provide independent dispute settlement. •        As a BeCommerce member you will enjoy knowledge and information share with other members. You receive free tests, white papers and publications, have access to the exclusive members network and you can participate in work groups (interest management). BeCommerce organises workshops and conventions in which you can participate and network free of charge or on a discount.

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Create Amazing Mobile Apps for Google Play & iTunes that combine your responsive PrestaShop web store with powerful AppNotch native app features.
module.additional_description: As a PrestaShop store developer, you'll now be able to create powerful mobile apps to help your clients:      * Put Your Store on Your Customer's Phone* Make it Easy to do Business.* Be One Tap Away to Order* Keep Their People Engaged.* Get More Repeat Business.* Increase Your Site's SEO Ranking* Increase Repeat Orders with Your Store App* Boost Your Brand - Be in Google Play and iTunes.* Send Effective Push Notifications for Specials   What's great is you can help your clients grow their business while earning extra income on the exceptional work you already did. You already built a beautiful mobile friendly website for your client that gives their users a usable mobile experience. But, customers now want and expect easy, simple engagement. They want to go to their phone and tap an app icon not type a long website address to go where they want to go. They want to get timely alerts or receive push notifications letting them know of a great deal available to them. With Google now linking websites to mobile apps, you can also give your clients the easiest and most cost-effective way to boost to their SEO ranking.  Here's how it works:  * Simply drop your mobile friendly website URL into the AppNotch app.* The result is an amazing app with your all the design and functionality of your website as the UI plus a powerful app menu with app features like push notifications, message log, camera, cash register and more.* AppNotch publishes your app in the Google Play or iTunes public app stores for you or you can publish yourself using your certificates.* Your app is synchronized with your website. Anytime you update your website or app menu, your mobile app will be updated in real time with no need to republish to the app stores.* You can try your app for FREE. Preview your app on your phone by simply dropping in your URL into AppNotch and we will send you the link to Preview your app by text or email   Support -  https://addons.prestashop.com/en/contact-us?id_product=23574   Please Vote and EnjoyYour votes really make a difference! Thanks

module.name: googleshopping
module.description: Google Shopping ayuda a negocios como el tuyo a llegar a la audiencia correcta con anuncios de producto relevantes , y la búsqueda de nuevos clientes
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Google Shopping ayuda a negocios como el tuyo a llegar a la audiencia correcta con anuncios de producto relevantes , y la búsqueda de nuevos clientes. Con Google Shopping, aumente sus ventas como mínimo ¡un 30%!
module.additional_description: Los anuncios de producto se muestran cuando los usuarios buscan productos como los que su negocio ofrece en google.es o en google.es/shopping. Google mostrará al cliente potencial una imagen del artículo, el precio y el nombre de la tienda. A los clientes que hagan clic en el anuncio se les dirigirá a su página web, donde podrán adquirir el producto, desde cualquier pantalla (ordenador , smartphone, tableta...) Ventajas:Incrementa las visitas a tu tienda apareciendo entre las 100 mil millones de búsquedas que Google recibe mensualmente Reduce el trabajo y el tiempo de un go-to-market: utiliza la información de producto disponible en PrestaShop, sin crear nuevos ficheros para subirlos a GooglePrecisión con los datos: importa continuamente ficheros actualizados de tu tienda PrestaShop, sin trabajo adicionalAumenta tu tasa de conversión gracias al tráfico cualificado de Google así como el posicionamiento de tu tienda en el buscador

module.name: bablic
module.description: Translate your PrestaShop store in minutes, no coding required, just use our user-friendly, visual editor
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Translate your PrestaShop store in minutes, no coding required, just use our user-friendly, visual editor. Choose from machine-translation, manual translation (do it yourself) or order professional human translation with just a click!
module.additional_description: Reach new customers globally in a matter of minutes & increase salesManually edit translations, replace images, fix style issues with just a click in our visual editorImmediately compete with the big guys using your fully localized PrestaShop store

module.name: themoneytizer
module.description: The Moneytizer module will make you generate income monetizing your order confirmation pages and/or integrating ads in your pages
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Moneytizer module will make you generate income monetizing your order confirmation pages and/or integrating ads in your pages. Place your tags in as little as two mouse clicks and start earning additional income always keeping your clients !
module.additional_description: This module will significantly increase your daily turnover offering your clients exclusive advantages. The Moneytizer is a « Club des Avantages » partner. The purpose of this club is to allow clients to benefit from exclusive advantages (e.g. refund of 15 euros for the first order, free delivery, 15% off your next purchases) all year round. Using the module to place our banner – Moneyback – on your order confirmation pages, will make you earn 10 euros for each new client signing up for the « Club des Avantages ». The order is already placed, you never loose or drive any of your clients away ! Following is the process : 1.     Place our banner – Moneyback – on your order confirmation pages2.     Once the client clicks on the banner, he is redirected to the registration page of the « Club des Avantages » shopping portal3.     When a client signs up, you earn 10 euros. Correct ! 100 registrations, mean indeed 1000 euros revenues derived from that single banner ! The « Club des Avantages » administers all the member’s advantages through its dedicated customer service. What is the role of the e-merchant then ? He just has to reap gains derived from registrations. Your site is getting a lot of hits ? Just do like the biggest e-merchants and earn revenues placing banners on your pages ! You will be paid for each view ! The module facilitates the insertion of any kind of ad unit on your website. Our offer is 100% free and without obligation.

module.name: wirecardceecheckoutseamless
module.categoryName: Pago con Tarjeta o Carteras digitales
module.description: Integration of all popular payment methods seamlessly and PCI DSS compliant into your online shop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integration of all popular payment methods seamlessly and PCI DSS compliant into your online shop.
module.additional_description: Wirecard Checkout Seamless supports all popular payment methods (credit cards, SEPA Direct Debit, invoice, etc.) - on any consumer device fulfilling PCI DSS compliance. The interface is integrated seamlessly into the online shop and allows for a customized configuration of the payment process (cross-selling and up-selling). Customer service is available quickly via live chat or a service hotline.

module.name: lanavettepickup
module.displayName: la Navette Pickup: deliver your parcels in parcelshops
module.categoryName: Punto de entrega y Recogida en tienda
module.description: La Navette Pickup is a parcelshop to parcelshop delivery service developed by Pickup, filial of the Groupe La Poste, and France’s 1st parcelshop network
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: La Navette Pickup is a parcelshop to parcelshop delivery service developed by Pickup, filial of the Groupe La Poste, and France’s 1st parcelshop network.This module enables you to have your parcels delivered in parcelshops in 48H from France.
module.additional_description: For your customers: ·        Economical: starting from 4,35€ (excl. Tax)·        Fast: 24/48h·        Safe: the recipient has to present and ID and sign to pick up the parcel.·        Tracking: track your parcel in real-time and the recipient is notified by SMS and email when upon delivery. For you: ·        Integrate our solution in a few clicks, with the help of our technical team if necessary·        A dynamic map of our Pickup parcelshops on your website·        Return to sender included (in case of refusal or no show of the recipient)·        A dedicated Customer Service·        Non-binding and no minimum volume or period

module.name: sendcloud
module.description: SendCloud helps to grow your online store by optimizing the shipping process
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: SendCloud helps to grow your online store by optimizing the shipping process. Shipping packages has never been that easy!
module.additional_description: SendCloud is the smart shipping tool for e-commerce. With SendCloud you can easily print shipping labels in one click and ship packages with multiple carriers like DHL, DPD, UPS, Bpost, PostNL, Colissimo and many more. Time-saving shipping toolWith SendCloud you can optimize your entire shipping process. From importing orders, printing shipping labels, sending personalized tracking mails to managing returns, you can automate every step in your shipping process.  Offer multiple delivery options and increase conversionResearch has shown that 67% of customers leave an online store during the checkout process. That’s why it’s important to offer multiple delivery options that fit your customers’ needs. Reduce shipping costs

module.name: worldfirst
module.description: World First – International Payments for Your BusinessSending money overseas? You could save money when paying international suppliers and receiving disbursements in foreign currencies
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: World First – International Payments for Your BusinessSending money overseas? You could save money when paying international suppliers and receiving disbursements in foreign currencies.
module.additional_description: World First helps you transfer money overseas at fantastic exchange rates which could save you up to 2.8% compared to using a bank(1). If you make payments to international suppliers, this will simply help reduce your costs. And if you receive payments in foreign currencies through your online store or via online marketplaces, you can collect these funds in local currency receiving accounts and repatriate the funds at a great rate too. These are just a few reasons why more than 100,000 customers use World First.

module.description: Mejora tus ventas gracias al módulo Stripe de Prestashop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Mejora tus ventas gracias al módulo Stripe de Prestashop. Tus clientes podrán pagar de forma segura y fácil con esta plataforma
module.additional_description: Instala el plugin de Stripe, crea una cuenta de Stripe o conecta tu cuenta existente, y empieza a aceptar pagos immediatamenteCrea tu cuenta de Stripe en 10 minutos y empieza a aceptar pagos de inmediato con Visa, MasterCard y American Express (sin necesidad de ID de comerciante o contrato con tu banco)Mejora tu tasa de conversión ofreciendo una fluida experiencia de pago a tus clientes: Stripe te permite integrar el formulario de pago en tu propia página, evitando así el tener que desviar a tus clientes a la página de una entidad bancaria para completar su compra.Mantén tus tasas de fraude bajo control gracias a un 3D Secure personalizable y Stripe Radar, nuestro conjunto de herramientas anti-fraude.Cientos de integraciones de terceros para enriquecer tu configuración con Stripe (facturación, SMS...)

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Swiss knife of e-commerceThe objective of Store Commander is to optimize all the steps indispensable to manage an online shop: updating texts, photos and price lists, stock balance display, product combinations management, etc.
module.additional_description: Prestashop Expert since 2009 with 98% customer satisfaction!  Less expensive than competing products: Whatever the number of workstations, you only pay for a single license.  The equivalent of dozens of separate modules. First-class customer service: Our customers are delighted with our support: 98% satisfaction over one year (+5000 support tickets)! Our reactivity is essential to success on the web. Openness and dialogue: Our systems are compatible and complement most ERP systems on the market today; they work directly on your web server and are multi-platform: PC/Mac/iPad/Linux, one license with an unlimited number of workstations and users.  Made-to-measure. Customizable solutions and add-ons allow Store Commander to be tailored to each profession.  One example? Grids Editor PRO add-on allows additional database fields management; as a result, bulk data management is as easy as pie!

module.name: ps_emailsmanager
module.description: Adapta el diseño de tus correos electrónicos a la identidad visual de tu sitio web, a tu actividad o a la época del año con el módulo nativo Gestor de plantillas de correos electrónicos, integrado por
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adapta el diseño de tus correos electrónicos a la identidad visual de tu sitio web, a tu actividad o a la época del año con el módulo nativo Gestor de plantillas de correos electrónicos, integrado por defecto en el back-office de tu tienda. Con este módulo gratuito podrás modificar fácilmente modelos de correos electrónicos transaccionales, como la confirmación de una suscripción o de un pedido, sin tener que recurrir a un diseñador.
module.additional_description: Este módulo de instalación y de gestión de plantillas de correos electrónicos te permite intercambiar diferentes modelos, modificarlos y guardar tu configuración. En función del diseño y del nivel de personalización que haya previsto el desarrollador, podrás personalizar tus plantillas. Entre otras cosas, podrás: modificar el color principal y secundario de los correos;elegir la fuente del texto;añadir enlaces hacia tu perfil en las redes sociales y modificar tus logos;introducir imágenes y textos adicionales. Con esta herramienta también podrás crear copias de seguridad de tus correos electrónicos transaccionales y del diseño predeterminado de PrestaShop. Por último, no necesitarás escribir o traducir el contenido de tus correos: el módulo recupera directamente las traducciones de los correos transaccionales disponibles por defecto en PrestaShop.
